name: activity9-ecommerce
description: E-commerce application with React frontend and NestJS backend

scripts.start:all: concurrently "cd activity9-ecommerce-backend && npm run start:dev" "cd activity9-ecommerce-frontend && set PORT=3001 && npm start"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd activity9-ecommerce-backend && npm install && cd ../activity9-ecommerce-frontend && npm install
